Why choose myosh for your workplace
-----------------------------------

myosh is flexible, cloud based safety software that features interactive dashboards, a synchronised mobile app, and over 50 configurable modules that integrate and adapt to your unique organisational requirements.

[Get in touch](/contact)

### Here are some numbers reported by organisations

### 10x

Labour costs saved vs myosh subscription cost

### $1m+

Saved in workers-comp premiums

### 0d

Spent on manual reconciliation

### 100%

Visibility on all risk mitigation measures

![two men in an office shaking hands over a laptop](https://assets-global.website-files.com/64ee6c6e0da86184dbf899c2/64ee7f0dabaf61e00f13d521_home-image-03.webp)

Featuring over 50 core modules
------------------------------

All modules can be easily integrated with one another and configured to interact with external software. The myosh team is focused on exceeding expectations for service and reliability with a platform that evolves perpetually based on user feedback and contributions from leading safety authorities.

[See modules](/modules)

This is all supported by the myosh training and support teams
-------------------------------------------------------------

![a blue and yellow object with a black square in the middle](https://assets-global.website-files.com/64ee6c6e0da86184dbf899c2/652397be788e5672312feb21_svg-1.svg)

### Customer Training

All myosh proposals include one-to-many training for the modules that you have chosen. Manuals and videos are always available on our website too.

![a yellow and blue rocket ship with a white background](https://assets-global.website-files.com/64ee6c6e0da86184dbf899c2/652398135af87f0a7c2e944f_svg_02.svg)

### Customer Support

Connect with the team to answer all your questions by email or phone for the lifetime of your subscription

[Get started](/myosh-free-trial)

------------------------------------------------------

### Make a difference

Millions of people rely on myosh to make a difference, in local and international organisations around the globe.

![a magnifying glass with a yellow background](https://assets-global.website-files.com/64ee6c6e0da86184dbf899c2/65239d3f4f2795533e03e196_icon-analysis.svg)

Complying with health and safety standards can lead to improvements in productivity, reduced insurance costs, and can even be used to win business.

Why choose myosh for your workplace?
====================================

Our mission is to drive improvement in workplace health and safety by providing value to our clients and engaging with the wider HSEQ community.  

[Overview](/overview)
[Our modules](/modules)

![a man sitting at a desk in front of a computer](https://assets-global.website-files.com/64ee6c6e0da86184dbf899c2/6514c380aa4ccbb380512a0e_manuals-thumbnail.jpeg)

Our Platform
------------

We provide our clients with an HSEQ platform that is continuously improved. We engage with our clients and industry experts to define best practices and identify new opportunities for both technical and theoretical development.

We provide comprehensive resources to enable clients and their teams to learn how to work with myosh efficiently so they can quickly make a difference in their workplace. These include [**Tutorials**](/resources/tutorials)
, [**Walkthroughs**](/resources/walkthroughs)
, [**Courses**](/resources/courses)
, [**Documentation**](/resources/documentation)
, and answers to [**FAQs**](/resources/faq)

We also offer free and heavily discounted systems to a range of Not For Profit Organisations. This has allowed these organisations to provide critical services while operating safely.

[Get started](/myosh-free-trial)

Our Community
-------------

We partner with professional industry organisations and HSE field experts to share information and knowledge essential for Continuing Professional Development.

Our range of Free Community Services includes:

Weekly [**HSEQ webinars**](/academy/webinars)
 covering the latest trends and relevant topics presented by leading safety authorities. We have a strong relationship with the Australian Institute of Health and Safety who attribute Continuing Professional Development Points for our webinar attendees.

Our weekly HSEQ Newsletter provides up to date safety information and is subscribed to by tens of thousands of people. Subscription is free and open to all our customers and anyone with an interest in improving workplace health and safety.

“**_Our mission is to drive improvement in workplace health and safety by providing value to our clients and engaging with the wider HSEQ community._**”

![two men in an office shaking hands over a laptop](https://assets-global.website-files.com/64ee6c6e0da86184dbf899c2/64ee7f0dabaf61e00f13d521_home-image-03.webp)

Glossary
========

A directory of definitions for common terms.

EHS
---

EHS is short for **Environment, Health, and Safety**.

‍

The abbreviation is used in the context of

*   Role descriptions: "James is a EHS Consultant at Standard Drilling Co."
*   Content: "Safety Managers typically subscribe to at least one EHS news and blog article publication."
*   Software classification: "myosh is a cloud-based EHS management platform"

The three topics are clustered in a collective term because they represent interconnected objectives that often rely on similar procedures for reporting, with professionals finding many of their skills in management of one area transferable to another.

‍

HSE
---

HSE is short for **Health, Safety, and Environment**.

‍

The abbreviation is used in the context of

*   Role descriptions: "James is a HSE Consultant at Standard Drilling Co."
*   Content: "Safety Managers typically subscribe to at least one HSE news and blog article publication."
*   Software classification: "myosh is a cloud-based HSE management platform"

The three topics are clustered in a collective term because they represent interconnected objectives that often rely on similar procedures for reporting, with professionals finding many of their skills in management of one area transferable to another.

‍

HSEQ
----

HSEQ is short for **Health, Safety, Environment, and Quality**.

The acronym is used in the context of

*   Role descriptions: "James is a HSEQ Consultant at Standard Drilling Co."
*   Content: "Safety Managers typically subscribe to at least one HSEQ news and blog article publication."
*   Software classification: "myosh is a cloud-based HSEQ management platform"

The four topics are clustered in a catchall acronym because they represent interconnected objectives that often rely on similar procedures for reporting, with professionals finding many of their skills in management of one area transferable to another.

SOP
---

SOP is short for **Safe Operating Procedures** or **Standard Operating Procedures**.

‍

SOPs are sets of standardised procedures that identify health and safety considerations relating to the operation of particular plant, machinery, or equipment. These procedures are codified in what is sometimes also called Safe Work Instructions (SWIs) or Safe Work Method Satements (SWMS) and are a legal requirement for any hazardous activities, in most jurisdictions. It has a similar definition to Safe Work Procedures, which is just a broader term that would be applied for general work tasks not necessarily related to operating machinery, etc.

‍

An example of a task for which an SOP must be established is the operation of a wide belt sander. Note that this is a set of instructions for a particular context, tailored to the workplace and the model/class of the machine; it is in addition to general safety training for dangerous machinery operation.

‍

SWI
---

SWI is short for **Safe Work Instructions**.

‍

SWIs are sets of standardised instructions that identify health and safety considerations relating to the use of particular machinery or equipment, or to particular tasks or procedures. Establishing and ensuring worker awareness of these directions is a legal requirement for any hazardous activities, in most jurisdictions.

‍

An example of a task for which an SWI document should be available is the use of a forklift in a warehouse. Note that this is a set of instructions for a particular context, tailored to the workplace; it is in addition to general safety training for forklift use.

SWP
---

SWP is short for **Safe Work Procedures**.

‍

SWPs are sets of standardised procedures that identify health and safety considerations relating to the use of particular machinery or equipment, or to particular tasks or activities. These procedures are codified in what is sometimes also called Safe Work Instructions (SWIs) or Safe Work Method Satements (SWMS) and are a legal requirement for any hazardous activities, in most jurisdictions.

‍

An example of a task for which an SWP must be established is the use of a forklift in a warehouse. Note that this is a set of instructions for a particular context, tailored to the workplace; it is in addition to general safety training for forklift use.

‍

WHS
---

WHS is short for **Work Health and Safety**.

‍

The abbreviation is used in the context of

*   Regulations: "Businesses need to be aware of WHS compliance requirements."
*   Competency: "During the orientation, new hires receive comprehensive training on WHS best practices."
*   Software: "myosh delivers cloud-based WHS solutions."

Contact us for a free consultation
----------------------------------

myosh will assist you to better understand and manage workplace safety by integrating hazards and incident reporting with investigations, actions and metrics reporting. Let's discuss your workplace requirements.

myosh Add-ons
=============

Bring additional capabilities to your myosh environment

![a yellow and blue cross with a white center](https://assets-global.website-files.com/64ee6c6e0da86184dbf899c2/65239e9a8b051edf58421ac1_icon-dashboard%201.svg)

Inspections Importer
--------------------

Import new or historic Inspection records with our Data Upload excel template, including sections, questions, and answers.

![a yellow and blue cross with a white center](https://assets-global.website-files.com/64ee6c6e0da86184dbf899c2/65239e9a8b051edf58421ac1_icon-dashboard%201.svg)

Rules Engine
------------

Critical processes, actions, and notifications are preconfigured to trigger based on responses. This automatic process bypasses the need for workers to make value judgements in the field. Custom tier only.

![a yellow and blue cross with a white center](https://assets-global.website-files.com/64ee6c6e0da86184dbf899c2/65239e9a8b051edf58421ac1_icon-dashboard%201.svg)

Scheduler
---------

Gain more oversight on your scheduled records with a scheduled table overview. Workflow status is designated by colour to easily monitor overdue items, and the completed percentage is calculated. Filter by date, hierarchy, and module for granular management.

![a yellow and blue cross with a white center](https://assets-global.website-files.com/64ee6c6e0da86184dbf899c2/65239e9a8b051edf58421ac1_icon-dashboard%201.svg)

Xporter
-------

Export your records, including attachments, in PDF format to a zip file.

![a yellow and blue cross with a white center](https://assets-global.website-files.com/64ee6c6e0da86184dbf899c2/65239e9a8b051edf58421ac1_icon-dashboard%201.svg)

Inspections Importer
--------------------

Import new or historic Inspection records with our Data Upload excel template, including sections, questions, and answers.

![a yellow and blue cross with a white center](https://assets-global.website-files.com/64ee6c6e0da86184dbf899c2/65239e9a8b051edf58421ac1_icon-dashboard%201.svg)

Rules Engine
------------

Critical processes, actions, and notifications are preconfigured to trigger based on responses. This automatic process bypasses the need for workers to make value judgements in the field. Custom tier only.

![a yellow and blue cross with a white center](https://assets-global.website-files.com/64ee6c6e0da86184dbf899c2/65239e9a8b051edf58421ac1_icon-dashboard%201.svg)

Scheduler
---------

Gain more oversight on your scheduled records with a scheduled table overview. Workflow status is designated by colour to easily monitor overdue items, and the completed percentage is calculated. Filter by date, hierarchy, and module for granular management.

![a yellow and blue cross with a white center](https://assets-global.website-files.com/64ee6c6e0da86184dbf899c2/65239e9a8b051edf58421ac1_icon-dashboard%201.svg)

Xporter
-------

Export your records, including attachments, in PDF format to a zip file.
